ListEmailMonthlyMetric.name: ListEmailMonthlyMetric
ListEmailMonthlyMetric.description: Represents the monthly engagement metrics for a single list email.

AllEmailsBouncedCount.description: The total hard and soft bounces that were triggered for this list email in the month.

AllEmailsDeliveredCount.description: The number of recipients who successfully received this list email in the month.

AllEmailsHardBouncedCount.description: The total hard bounces that were triggered for this list email in the month.

AllEmailsLinkClickedCount.description: The number of link clicks by the recipients of this list email in the month.

AllEmailsOpenedCount.description: The number of recipients who opened this list email in the month.

AllEmailsOutOfOfficeCount.description: The number of out-of-office replies that were triggered for this list email in the month.

AllEmailsRepliedCount.description: The number of replies to this list email in the month.

AllEmailsSentCount.description: The number of recipients to whom this list email was sent in the month.

AllEmailsSoftBouncedCount.description: The total soft bounces that were triggered for this list email in the month.

HardBounceTrackableSends.description: The number of recipients who were sent this list email with hard bounce tracking in the month. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

LinkClickTrackableSends.description: The number of recipients who were sent this list email with link click tracking in the month. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

ListEmailId.description: The ID of the related list email.

Month.description: The month in which the engagement occurred.

MonthInt.description: The month in which the engagement occurred, in yyyymm format.

OpenTrackableSends.description: The number of recipients who were sent this list email with open tracking in the month. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

OutOfOfficeTrackableSends.description: The number of recipients who were sent this list email with out-of-office tracking in the month. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

ReplyTrackableSends.description: The number of recipients who were sent this list email with reply tracking in the month. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

SoftBounceTrackableSends.description: The number of recipients who were sent this list email with soft bounce tracking in the month. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

TrackableSendHardBounceRate.description: The percentage of recipients for whom this list email, sent with hard bounce tracking, resulted in a hard bounce in the month. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableSendLinkClickRate.description: The percentage of recipients who clicked on a link in this list email that was sent with link click tracking in the month. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

TrackableSendOpenRate.description: The percentage of recipients who opened this list email that was sent with open tracking in the month. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

TrackableSendOutOfOfficeRate.description: The percentage of recipients for whom the list email, sent with out-of-office tracking, resulted in an out-of-office reply in the month. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableSendReplyRate.description: The percentage of recipients for whom this list email, sent with reply tracking, resulted in a reply in the month. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

TrackableSendSoftBounceRate.description: The percentage of recipients for whom this list email, sent with soft bounce tracking, resulted in a soft bounce in the month. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

UniqueEmailsLinkClickedCount.description: The number of unique recipients who clicked a link in this list email in the month.

UniqueEmailsOpenedCount.description: The number of unique recipients who opened this list email in the month.

UniqueEmailsRepliedCount.description: The number of unique recipients who replied to this list email in the month.
